Uses of Class
isocline.reflow.Configuration

  • Packages that use Configuration 
    Package Description
    isocline.reflow  

    • Uses of Configuration in isocline.reflow

      Fields in isocline.reflow declared as Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Configuration Configuration.ECHO
      Initialization settings related to thread settings for FlowProcessor initialization Preset for low-end environments, the initial thread count is 1, the maximum thread count is 3, and the thread priority setting is Thread.NORM_PRIORITY state.
      static Configuration Configuration.HYPER
      Initialization settings related to thread settings for FlowProcessor initialization Preset for HYPER environments, the initial thread count is 64, the maximum thread count is 128, and the thread priority setting is Thread.MAX_PRIORITY state.
      static Configuration Configuration.NOMAL
      Initialization settings related to thread settings for FlowProcessor initialization.
      static Configuration Configuration.PERFORMANCE
      Initialization settings related to thread settings for FlowProcessor initialization Preset for high-end environments, the initial thread count is 24, the maximum thread count is 36, and the thread priority setting is Thread.MAX_PRIORITY state.
      Methods in isocline.reflow that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Configuration Configuration.create()
      Create new instance of Configuration
      Configuration Configuration.lock()
      Lock the configuration information from being modified.
      Configuration Configuration.setExecuteTimeout(long executeTimeout)
      Set a timeout
      Configuration Configuration.setInitThreadWorkerSize(int initThreadWorkerSize)
      Set a initial thread worker size
      Configuration Configuration.setMaxThreadWorkerSize(int maxThreadWorkerSize)
      Set a size for max thread worker
      Configuration Configuration.setMaxWorkQueueSize(int maxWorkQueueSize)
      Set a queue size for max
      Configuration Configuration.setThreadPriority(int threadPriority)
      Set a priority of Thread
      Configuration Configuration.setThresholdWaitTimeToReady(long thresholdWaitTimeToReady)
      If the remaining waiting time to enter the ready state and the time remaining until the next execution remain below this set time, the system enters the waiting queue and enters the waiting state.
      Methods in isocline.reflow with parameters of type Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FlowProcessor FlowProcessorFactory.getProcessor(String id, Configuration config)
      Returns a customized FlowProcessor implementation object.
